DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to represent the result of a fungal culture procedure.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A plant-like organism that does not make chlorophyll.  Mushrooms, yeasts, and molds are examples.  The plural is fungi._The customary beliefs, social forms, and material traits of a racial, religious, or social group.  Also, the set of shared attitudes, values, goals, and practices that characterizes a company or corporation. (from Webster's Dictionary)_An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident._

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A kingdom of eukaryotic, heterotrophic organisms that live as saprobes or parasites, including mushrooms, yeasts, smuts, molds, etc. They reproduce either sexually or asexually, and have life cycles that range from simple to complex. Filamentous fungi refer to those that grow as multicellular colonies (mushrooms and molds).:The customary beliefs, social forms, and material traits of a racial, religious, or social group.  Also, the set of shared attitudes, values, goals, and practices that characterizes a company or corporation. (from Webster's Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: A kingdom of eukaryotic, heterotrophic organisms that live as saprobes or parasites, including mushrooms, yeasts, smuts, molds, etc. They reproduce either sexually or asexually, and have life cycles that range from simple to complex. Filamentous fungi refer to those that grow as multicellular colonies (mushrooms and molds).
A pattern of learned beliefs, values, and behavior that are shared within a group. It includes language, styles of communication, practices, customs, and views on roles and relationships.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood, urine, or other substance from the body. Tests can help determine a diagnosis, plan treatment, check to see if treatment is working, or monitor the disease over time._A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something._The result of an action._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

Concepts.definition: A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of normality following an examination or investigation looking for the presence of a microorganism, disease, or condition.

Concepts.definition: A finding of normality following an examination or investigation looking for the presence of a microorganism, disease, or condition.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: A process of becoming larger or longer or more numerous.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
A process of becoming larger or longer or more numerous.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A process of becoming larger or longer or more numerous.

Concepts.definition: A process of becoming larger or longer or more numerous.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.:A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.:Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.
A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
